description:
When Kogoro, Conan, and Ran go to the cottage where a zombie movie was filmed, they encounter Heiji and Kazuha there. A couple ran over a zombie with a broken neck on a road near the cottage, and Heiji has come to confirm the truth behind the story. Later, a movie crew arrives to shoot a trailer for the sequel to the zombie movie. While filming, producer Harawaki goes missing, and the others search for him in the cottage. Conan and Heiji discover the body of the dead Harawaki, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La villa encerclée par les zombies (1re partie)
ゾンビが囲む別荘 (前編)
